text.page:
199
102-100a la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos gang rgyus 'byung de dag gi/ /rgyu dang de 'gog gang yin pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal te/ /dge sbyong chen pos de skad gsungs/ /ye d+harmA he tu pra b+ha bA he tun+te ShAn+ta thA ga to h+ya ba data/ te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e ba~M bA dI ma hA shra ma NaH/ snying po 'di lan cig brjod pas sdig pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/ /mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad zhi zhing bzlog par 'gyur ro/ /dngos po gang la dmigs te brjod na sangs rgyas kyi sku 'am/ mchod rten du byas par 'gyur ro/ /mchod pa gang la dmigs te brjod na 'jig rten gyi khams gang ba tsam phul bar 'gyur ro/ /rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i snying po rdzogs s+ho//
